programme.title: Italian Open 2014 Highlights
programme.desc: Day four of the Italian Open from Circolo Golf Torino in La Mandria. Hennie Otto held the overnight lead, with Richie Ramsay just two shots off the pace.

programme.desc: The 72nd Italian Open at Golf Club Milano. South African Hennie Otto was victorious at last year's event.

programme.title: Italian Open 2017 Highlights
programme.desc: The fourth and final day of the Italian Open from the Golf Club Milano. Englishman Matt Wallace heads into the final day leading on 17 under, a two-shot lead.
